column1: IOT-1	A tracking tag has an identifier
IOT-2	A tracking tag signals its location (and that of the resource it is assigned to)
IOT-3	A tracking tag signals its location at a particular time
IOT-4	The location of a tracking tag includes its coordinates (x,y,z), its location radius, its inferred accuracy, its inferred movement and its inferred speed
IOT-5	A tracking tag belongs to a tag group
IOT-6	A tag group has an identifier and a name
IOT-7	A tag group will be assigned to workders or to equipment
IOT-8	a tracking tag is assigned to a tracked zone, which is a sub-class of spatial zones in the facility ontology
